name: cooling unit
description: A big, blocky metal device for refrigerating large areas, now just a source of parts to salvage and repurpose.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: central air filter
description: Cleans out dust mites, smoke particles, and more!

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: dishwasher
description: This metal box used to spray hot water and soap at dirty dishes to make them clean and to save people an unpleasant chore.  Now, with the power gone and it sitting for a while, it's starting to smell a bit off.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: dryer
description: 'Dry your clothes!' would be what you'd do if electricity was running.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: abstract floor lamp
description: Abstract furniture.  If you see this, something went wrong.

name: floor lamp (off)
description: A tall standing lamp, meant to plug into a wall and light up a room.
message: You switch on the floor lamp.

name: floor lamp (no power)
description: A tall standing lamp, plugged into a wall.  This one has no power.
message: You switch off the floor lamp.

name: floor lamp (on)
description: A tall standing lamp, plugged into a wall.
message: You switch off the floor lamp.
//: Please keep steady_consumer to 300 s or more to avoid lag.

name: grid floodlight (off)
description: An industrial flood light, hooked up to draw from a local grid.  Flicking it on will output a nice, bright source of light.

bash.//: Some extra wire and scrap metal from smash results matching vehicle floodlights
bash.//2: Variable reduction, destroy_threshold equal to str_min instead of str_max due to delicate electronics

name: grid floodlight (no power)
description: An industrial flood light, hooked up to draw from a local grid.  It's currently out of power.

name: grid floodlight (on)
description: An industrial flood light, hooked up to draw from a local grid.  It's currently providing plenty of light.
//: Increased brightness and power draw over utility lights which don't draw grid power, but far less than vehicle ones
//2: Please keep steady_consumer to 300 s or more to avoid lag.

transform.msg: The utility light flickers and dies.

name: rewired street light (off)
description: A source of light used to illuminate streets and the surrounding area.  It's been rewired to draw power from a local grid, but is currently switched off.
message: You switch on the street light.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: rewired street light (no power)
description: A source of light used to illuminate streets and the surrounding area.  It's been rewired to draw power from a local grid, but lacks power at the moment.
message: You switch off the street light.

name: rewired street light (on)
description: A source of light used to illuminate streets and the surrounding area.  It's been rewired to draw power from a local grid, brightening up the night once again.
message: You switch off the street light.
//: Please keep steady_consumer to 300 s or more to avoid lag.

transform.msg: The street light flickers and dies.

name: abstract glass fridge
description: Abstract furniture.  If you see this, something went wrong.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: glass door fridge (off)
description: There's something tantalizing about seeing the contents of a glass fridge on display.  It is switched off.
message: You switch on the glass fridge.

name: glass door fridge
description: There's something tantalizing about seeing the contents of a glass fridge on display.  It has no power.
message: You switch off the glass fridge.

name: glass door fridge (on)
description: There's something tantalizing about seeing the contents of a glass fridge on display.  It is switched on.
message: You switch off the glass fridge.
//: Consumes more power due to worse insulation.

name: glass door freezer (off)
description: A glass door freezer!  Maybe there's some ice cream inside.  It is switched off.
message: You switch on the glass freezer.

name: glass door freezer
description: A glass door freezer!  Maybe there's some ice cream inside.  It has no power.
message: You switch off the glass freezer.

name: glass freezer (on)
description: A glass door freezer!  Maybe there's some ice cream inside.  It is switched on.
message: You switch off the glass freezer.
//: Consumes more power due to worse insulation.

name: furnace
description: A gas-powered forced-air central heating unit, with an internal fan to push the air through a building's air ducts and keep it warm.

name: washing machine
description: You could wash your dirty clothes if electricity was running.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: oven
description: Used for heating and cooking food with electricity.  Might still work, if you manage to power it.  It's safe to light a fire inside of it.

bash.//: Variable reduction since might hit more or less material.

name: RV kitchen unit
description: Used for heating and cooking food with electricity.  Ripped from an RV.  It's safe to light a fire inside of it.

name: blacksmith bellows
description: Used for delivering air to increase the combustion and heat output of a forge.  Doesn't look like it's working, although it still has parts.

name: blacksmith drop hammer
description: Used for fast production of metal items.  Doesn't look like it's working, although it still has parts.

name: document shredder
description: It's not all about hiding government secrets, sometimes you just want to stop identity theft.

name: server stack
description: This is a big pile of computers.  They're all turned off.

name: large satellite dish
description: Somewhere up there, there are still satellites, orbiting and doing their thing, sending signals down to an Earth that is no longer listening.

description: A vehicle recharging station connected to building's electric grid, providing higher output than consumer battery chargers.

description: Power outlet connecting a building's electrical grid to a vehicle.  To use, attach a jumper cable to a vehicle and then to the connector.

name: grid food dehydrator
description: A portable food dehydrator connected to a electrical grid, that could be useful for preserving food.

name: grid food processor
description: A food processor connected to a electrical grid.  Capable of slicing, chopping, shredding, grinding, pureeing and mixing.

name: grid vacuum sealer
description: A portable heat sealer unit, connected to a electrical grid.  It could be used for vacuum-packing food to preserve it.

name: grid FOODCO kitchen buddy
description: A multi-function crafting station, with a water purifier, food processor, food dehydrator, vacuum sealer, and hand press for making ammo.  Draws power from the electrical grid.  If you attempt to craft an item that needs one of the kitchen buddy's functions, it will automatically be selected as a tool.

description: A vehicle chemistry lab connected to a electrical grid, combining the functions of a hotplate, electrolysis kit, and chemistry tools.

name: grid autoclave
description: This thing is basically an extremely high tech laundry machine or dishwasher.  It steams things at temperatures that will kill almost anything.  It could be used to mend faulty bionics that need sterilization.

name: air conditioner (no power)
description: A window-mounted air conditioner, plugged into the wall.  This one has no power.

name: air conditioner (off)
description: A window-mounted air conditioner, plugged into the wall.  This one is currently turned off.

name: air conditioner (on)
description: A window-mounted air conditioner, plugged into the wall.  This one is running and providing cool air.

name: grid plutonium generator
description: This imposing apparatus harnesses the power of the atom.  A compact nuclear reactor, sealed and configured to provide nearly limitless electrical power from refined nuclear fuel.  Now installed and connected, it will generate a small but constant source of electricity.

description: An all-in-one handloading tool that can both assemble ammunition and break it back down for materials, includes a hotplate for bullet molding connected to an electrical grid.
